The 1D heat kernel with diffusivity Œ± : ‚ÑùŒ± (assumed positive in theorems).

noncomputable def heatKernel (Œ± : ‚Ñù) (x t : ‚Ñù) : ‚Ñù := (1 / Real.sqrt (4 * Real.pi * Œ± * t)) * Real.exp (-(x^2) / (4 * Œ± * t))

Property 1: For each t > 0, Œ¶(x, t) is always strictly positive and integrates to one.
